statements: UPDATE customer_reviews SET rating = 4.5, review_text = 'Great experience!' WHERE review_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET review_text = 'Not satisfied with the service.', rating = 2.5 WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET rating = 4.5, review_text = 'Great experience!' WHERE review_id = 101 AND location_id = 201 AND customer_id = 301;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET review_text = 'Average service', rating = 3.0 WHERE location_id = 202 AND customer_id = 302 AND review_id = 102;
